content:
```json
{
  "userRequest": "Create a mobile product detail screen with full-width hero image at the top showing a car, followed by product title \"BMW X5 2023\", price \"$45,000\", seller name \"John Smith\" with avatar, location \"Lagos, Nigeria\", and contact seller button. Make the hero image edge-to-edge to create visual impact.",
  "analysisResults": {
    "screenType": "Mobile product detail screen for a car listing",
    "primaryGoal": "Allow users to view car details and contact the seller",
    "requirements": [
      "Display a full-width hero image of the car",
      "Show product title: \"BMW X5 2023\"",
      "Show price: $45,000",
      "Display seller information: Name (\"John Smith\") with avatar and location (\"Lagos, Nigeria\")",
      "Include a \"Contact Seller\" button"
    ],
    "constraints": "Mobile platform, automotive sales context, hero image should be edge-to-edge"
  }
}
```
